title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items sector, the column icons are not being displayed. This is causing confusion and making it difficult to work with the database.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons are not visible.
EB: Expected Result: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should be displayed.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the Available Items sector.
3. Locate and click on the icon for the connected Derby database.
4. Observe that the column icons are not displayed.
